1. Nidalee will 100% be the first one. She only needs two items to overkill everyone all over the Rift.
2. I'm not sure about Fizz getting nerfed. Most likely they will reduce his Ultimate interaction with his AA and buff his AP scalings.
3. Lee nerfed? Why. He's not even a top tier jungler right now. One thing new jungle did well was making his early pressure very risky because if he doesn't get it right, he would fall behind on experience. So no, Lee is not going to be nerfed in some months so far.

Hi guys, my thoughts on this is that Nid is probably going to get nerfed before fizz and there is a 0.01% probability that we will ever going to see Lee nerfs from Riot (I'll be damned if he does). The reason for this is because Riot isn't going to change Fizz back to his original state or lower his ratios after they changed him from an AP assasin to an AD bruiser. Riot is not going to gimp his ratios anymore since there are still people playing AP fizz and it will further upset them and make the champ even worse than it is now. 

On the other hand, if Riot buffs his ratios to where they were before the reign of the AD fizz, the old AP fizz will simply re-emerge and create more toxic one-shot playstyles. The only thing I can see Riot doing is nerfing (possibly removing) the damage amplification or lowering his stats and then give his ratios a slight buff so AD fizz can be toned down to a controllable level. Hopefully we will see more AP Fizzes back online as what Riot would have wanted.

Nidalee, however, just needs some fine tuning for her damage or CDs and that's it so she's way easier to hot fix.
